casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

October 23, 2009

[Cite as 10/23/2009 Case Announcements, 2009-Ohio-5577.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2008-2502. State v. Bodyke.

Huron App. Nos. H-07-040, H-07-041, and H-07-042, 2008-Ohio-6387. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Huron County. Upon consideration of the motion of amicus curiae Ohio Attorney General to participate in oral argument scheduled for November 4, 2009,

It is ordered by the court that the motion is granted, and amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to appellee.
